entry.title: Great Question (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Engineers (Rails, React, Remote)
entry.summary: Great Question makes it easy to include customer research as a part of every product release - whether it's customer interviews, prototype tests or surveys. Companies from Adidas Runtastic to O'Reilly Media use oru product to put their customers at the center of their product decisions. Our mission is to democratize research - make it easy for anyone at your company to understand what research has been done already, what is currently happening, and ask new questions to make sure you're building something people want. We're 3rd time entrepreneurs, having worked together for 10 years now with 2 exits under our belts. Back by Y Combinator, Funders Club & top angel investors. We're now looking to hire Senior Software Engineers to help us build and solidify our product. We're fully remote, and built on Rails + React + Typescript. Interested? Find more info here: https://careers.greatquestion.co/founding-rails-engineer Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28101776 Points: 1 # Comments: 0
